page.title: 01Religion
page.content: Denomination - Weston Patrick Parish Church -dedicated to St.Lawrence -Church of England. Weston Patrick is part of a Benefice comprising Upton Grey, Herriard, Tunworth and Weston Patrick expected soon to annex South Warnborough and Long Sutton Benefice-Domiciled in Upton Grey part of Odiham Deanery and Diocese of Winchester. Parish residents mainly Anglican faith, some Roman Catholic and Nonconformist. Liturgy-In use--Book of Common Prayer and Second Series Incumbent-None at present. John Jenkyns to be installed initially as Priest-in-charge in November 1985. Powntley Copse is in Upton Grey Parish and Pickaxe Lane is in S.Warnborough Parish.
